import React from 'react' import { language } from '../utils/utils' import PublishPost from './Modals/PublishPost' import Report from './Modals/Report' function Modal({ name, data }) { return (
{name === "report-modal" && (language.includes("tr") ? "Bildir" : "Report")}
{name === "report-modal" && || name === "publish-post-modal" && }
) } export default Modal
